name: spirit-island-renderer
description: Renders images of spirits for spirit island

scripts.prepack: npm run build &&  cross-var replace "process.env.npm_package_version" `$npm_package_version` lib/const.js
scripts.changelog: npx auto-changelog --template automasation/changelog.hbs -p && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.tag: npx auto-changelog -p --template automasation/tag.hbs --output out/tag.md && npx ts-node automasation/tag.ts
scripts.preparetest: npm run generate-schema && git add spirit-schema.json && npx ts-node automasation/checkTag.ts && git add package.json && npm run changelog && cross-var git commit -m "Release v$npm_package_version" && npm run tag
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run preparetest && git push && git push --tags

author: Patrick Kranz
